title: Badge Styling Inconsistencies
description: The status and priority badges do not have uniform padding and border radius, leading to inconsistent styling across different pages of the app.

title: Navigation Links Unresponsive
description: Clicking on the navigation links doesn't change the active view sometimes. This appears to be a React routing issue and occurs after using the browser back button.

title: Notifications Not Triggering
description: Users are not being notified when a new issue is assigned to them. This leads to delays in resolution as users are unaware of their responsibilities.

title: Dark Mode Styling Bugs
description: Some UI components like dropdown arrows and input borders are hard to see in dark mode due to insufficient contrast or incorrect styles not overridden.

title: Text Overlapping in Table
description: In the issues table, long titles and descriptions overflow into other columns, making the table hard to read without horizontal scrolling.

title: Incorrect Priority Display
description: The color badges for priority levels are not consistent. 'High' is sometimes shown in blue instead of red, leading to confusion for users reviewing issue urgency.

title: Missing Timestamps
description: Some of the issues in the database do not have a 'createdAt' timestamp, causing them to sort incorrectly or not display at all in the sorted list.

title: Priority Filter Not Working
description: The priority filter dropdown has no effect when selected. Issues with different priorities still appear in the list regardless of the filter selected.

title: 404 Error on Detail Page
description: Visiting the details page of certain issues results in a 404 error. This seems to happen when the issue ID contains non-numeric characters.

title: Search Function Slow
description: When searching for issues by title, the system becomes very slow and sometimes unresponsive, especially when there are more than 100 records in the database.

title: Data Not Saving
description: Changes made to issue status or priority are not persisting in the database. Users report that after refreshing the page, all modifications are lost.

title: Crash on Form Submit
description: The application crashes when a user submits the 'Create Issue' form with special characters in the description. This seems to be due to a validation or encoding problem on the backend.

title: UI Misalignment
description: On devices with smaller screen sizes, such as mobile phones, the buttons in the header section are misaligned and overlap with other elements, making the interface difficult to use.

title: Login Failure
description: Users are unable to log in after the recent update. The login button appears unresponsive, and no error messages are being displayed, which is confusing for users.
